You know, ask for another drink and by the time it arrives it's almost too late. That sort of thing. The bathrooms need to be cleaned more often and the trash emptied. The last time we went there the hostess almost insisted we sit in the bar. We had to respond "no" three different times before she kind of huffed and seated us in the dining room. It wasn't like there was no seating available in the dining area? Anyway, if she had said they were short staff in the dining area and we might receive better service in the bar area, I would have said yes! All that being said, yes, I will return for more, but at least I know what to expect.

No reason for negative reviews when this place has only been open for a few months. The menu is completely different than the ones at the other Red Robin's I've been to years ago. Ask for Desiree, BEST SERVER who is attentive & professional!
Bad service, bad food, not even their fries were done properly! We have always been red Robin regulars in our old place....first time in this location and have had the worst experience

Horrible!!! I ordered the Tavern burger combo to be picked up at my lunch time. I work around the corner, I went ahead and asked for the lemonade to be strawberry (little did I know it was an extra $5!!!) I got there paid for my food. When I was ready to eat I find literally 6 cold fries and a messy burger. No napkins. I would have rather spent my $15 somewhere else!!!!

Decor is nice but food is terrible. Hamburgers are their specialty, but even McDonald's is better. Fries are absolutely horrible - big, mushy, flavorless. Kind of like eating greasy cardboard. I'll stick to Five Guys, perfect hamburgers, perfect fries, all the time.
Always great food and the service is the best thank you for the great service tonight Jacob

Went in for my daughters birthday dinner sat down at bar with my husband then got up to go to restroom left my DG sunglasses at the bar by my husband when I came back they were gone and the girl behind the bar was the only person around so she stole them obliviously but denied it as did all go the personnel, they wont be seeing any more of my business thieves!!!!

The wait time was pretty accurate proposed by the hostess. The place was packed but 30min wait not bad I guess. Our waitress Taylor was very attentive and nice which is why this is a 4 star instead of a 3 star. She had a smile on her face every time she passed by even though she was swarmed with other tables. The actual food now so the onion ring tower was really good. They had ranch and this other sauce that my family and I devoured. Now to my main course. I ordered a Banzai Burger which was "okay". Maybe I expected much considering that Slaters 50/50 raise the bar very high. They advertise as Gourmet Burgers so maybe it's just I was expecting better. Anyway while my burger was okay the staff are nice and the onion rings were good so overall 4 stars but probably won't return to eat a burger here.

Anelise is the best server we have had here! She is super friendly and attentive. The overall atmosphere and decor of the new location is great too and as always the food is amazing! Love the cheesecake

Our food was great so kudos to the chefs. Service was a bit slow, would've preferred a booth but wasn't asked and just seated us at the table. Took a bit to get the bill than the machine wouldn't work to process our debit card.  Also we ordered a regular size shake for my son and she told us they made the monster on accident so we can just have it than i noticed it wasnt just given but they charged us. Your mistake so i shouldn't have been charged but whatever. Overall we'd return.

We stopped in for lunch today. My wife ordered the Tavern burger and fries. It was very good. I ordered the Tavern Mac & Cheese with salad. The Mac & Cheese was very good, but the lettuce was room temperature. I like a cold, crispy salad.  Also, they don't have WiFi.

I should not expect more. Been to this restaurant twice and was disappointed by the service. Nothing stands out as a a red flag but I still had a disappointing time. I probably sound high maintenance but that is not the case. Food was very good. Everything came out as ordered and tasted great but I still felt like I was disturbing the flow rather than being welcome. Maybe bad timing but everyone seemed more focused on finishing their side work.

I used to really love Red Robin but it seems like over the years they have gone downhill especially this location has not impressed me at all. I have never had a a consistent experience. Often times the bartender's were terrible and other times the service was just very slow in general. I was really hoping that once they moved and got relocated that they would make some improvements but sadly nothing changed. It seems that they did put more focus on the bar and increase the staff for that area but the food overall is just not what it used to be. I tried going there twice in the new location and both times the food was terrible. I used to really love the bottomless fries which they used to serve in a basket but now they serve it in this crappy metal cup. I understand you can order more but the size of the fries I've gotten way smaller. The last two experiences the fries were cold, very limp and not fresh. It almost seemed as if the fries were recycled off of somebody else's plate like all of the small ends that are left that no one eats. I used to always like to get the crispy cod Burger but even that wasn't good. I've asked around and most of my friends have given the same response that's something changed when they moved in the food just isn't good. I just really hope that as a corporation Red Robin really takes Yelp Yelp reviews into consideration and does something to improve the food, the service and the overall experience at their locations. I'm really sad to say that until something is improved and even the Yelp reviews get better I won't be going back.
Don't know why there are so many negative reviews...This is one of our favorite places to go ..Food is always great and servers are friendly..I love the steak fries. I love this place

After my one star review I thought it would be fair to give them another chance to change my mind, so I went back! I'm keeping my one star!!! Horrible service!!! Long wait!!! Takes forever to get your food!!! Also the food is not the same anymore!!! Burgers don't taste or look like they use too!!! Ever since they moved from the Mall the place went DOWN HILL!!! Part of me is blaming corporate, cause they have done nothing about it! The other part is the Manager!!! This guy has to be the worst Manager I have ever come across!!! Instead of dealing with issues he runs and hides! The crap that goes on now would never happen if the other Manager that worked at the mall RR was there! 19 years of "use to be" great place has finally come to an end...and with great pleasure! Good luck RR to longevity!

My son and I just came from there and I must say that the service needs a lot of improvement. First, our waitress took our drink order then said she would return to take our order as opposed to asking if we were ready to order, which we were.  Second, we ordered a shorty onion ring stack and she failed to provide plates, much less to see how we were doing. Thirdly, I was specific in my order and did not receive my condiment WITH my meal forcing me to wait to eat.  Fourthly "bottom-less fries" right? The waitress finally checked in on us and offered more fries but said it would take a few minutes, which it did. Here I am waiting for my burger to get colder.  Though my waitress was nice, the experience left me un-impressed and re-thinking any future visit.
Friendly staff, the food is good and love the bottomless fries. This is a great place for a beer with friends, some good burgers and munch on fries as you chat.
Decided to go have some launch on sat 11 th. Food was delish. Our waitress was the absolute best, her name was breezy. She was a doll. We stopped in at noon. Drinks & everything was perfect

We have gone to Red Robin's in various states for years and have always been happy with everything until we visited this one.  I was disappointed in the service for starters.  Our waitress was nice but not very present.  I had to get up and walk over to the kitchen to get some help.  The restaurant was dirty as well.  Dirt and food on the carpet that had not been cleaned up and the bathrooms were dirty as well.  The food (first time ever at a Red Robin) was bad.

Nice new exterior.That ends when you go in ,it's all the same old Elephant bar . Yes with out wifi. 3 wifi's are available but they won't help you or give you a password. If you earn your living on your phone , Verizon is not your friend here. Signal so low can't receive files. Service was good but that's all I can say .
Great gourmet burgers! Very good service and love the new location. Wait staff seems to be better at new site.

Ok. So my last review of this place was extremly unfavorable. I have come here a few times since, and still the same very slow service. I honestly don't know why I continue to come, aside from the fact I can walk to the place and I enjoy beer. Tonight, we arrived at 6:35pm and promptly sat at the bar and had our order in by 6:40pm. Two burgers, easy enough right? We just got our food at 7:32pm. So, it took 52 minutes to make 2 burgers. When I asked about the wait, i was told they had just hired a new cook staff. They must have a new cook staff all the time judging from the other reviews. By the way, I was contacted by Red Robin about my last review, no sincerity, no let me make this better. Very dissapointed. Since they moved it has been nothing but downhill, and you can deffinitly see it. Time to make some changes Red Robin, or maybe I'll see a new restaurant in this location in a few years.

So this is the first time coming to this location and I have to say that I was quite impressed. Not only by the layout and the environment of the restaurant, but because of how friendly the service was. My server was Alexandra and she was really wonderful. She was very attentive and made some delicious recommendations. Just because of her alone I would give this place 5 stars. I've always loved going to Red Robin in general but I think that with this location, fast service, and friendly staff I will definitely be coming back here again.

My favorite server there is by far Wesley.  He has this smile that lights up a room! He is so engaging and friendly! I am sure I am not the only one that feels as if his service is through the roof. Red Robin is good but his customer service makes it great and a place someone would want to come back! The royal burger is my favorite burger! There is just something about a burger with an egg that changes the game! Also the sweet potato fries are really good with the chipotle ketchup!

Some of the found my family order was great others just thought it was ok. Our waiter somewhat attentive. He was either too busy to come to our table enough or was too slow to keep up with his tables quick enough. Our drinks were waiting empty multiple times.

I really enjoy the burgers here. They have a nice full bar and great service. If they have a wait you can choose to sit at the bar. Recommendations Big Ghost Burger (SPICY) Burning Love Burger (SPICY) Garlic Fries Guac & Chips Lagunitas IPA (BEER)

Second time we have come to this Red Robin location. Second time we have experienced poor atmosphere dirty floors, sticky table, and utensils.  Asked to sit in a quite location and was sat in a room with a huge loud child's birthday party. Very disappointed the food was fine but won't come back

Ugggh! I love Red Robin but they fell short at this location. My friend and I stopped in one evening after shopping at the mall. He ordered the spinach dip and I ordered the blue cheese boca burger. His spinach dip was  a hot mess! It came out with a bunch of chopped red onions all over the top, we looked at it like...what is this? He stirred it all in and ate it anyways, it was late and we were hungry. The celery that came with it was disgusting! Who would ever serve anyone some old brown celery? When we brought it to our waiters attention, the replacement batch that came out had brown ends also. Stevie Wonder must have been cooking in the kitchen that night, thats all I can say to that because anyone with eye sight would NEVER attempt to put that on someone's plate. My boca burger was just O.k. And the "bottomless fries"?? What a joke, they literally bring you out a plate of five more fries when you ask. Over all it was a big disappointment and I doubt I will come back to this location.

This is your typical Red Robin/Chilis style restaurant. The service is a little slow and they have black carpet throughout some dining areas which looks horrendous. You can see every single crumb and piece of trash through out the floor. It's a little off putting because it really makes the place look dirty. They have these tiny windows by the booth where you can lift or close the curtain on your own. We lifted the curtain and a bunch of dust came out and onto our table. They could clean up a little more here. My mushroom burger was good but the size of the burgers have shrunk a little. They also have some decent buffalo wings. None of the food is really that great. It's okay but not really good enough to make you want to be a repeat customer.

Server was Anelise. She spilled ranch all over me then was like, "oh my gosh, you spilled ranch on yourself. Let me get napkins for you." Then made fun of me in front of family when they arrived. Food is decent but the service and wait times for food is terrible. Last time I'm giving this place a try.

The FOOD was amazing, like always. The SERVICE was terrible (the worst I've had in a long time). Our server was a female (Alex) and she was THE WORST. After we got seated, she took our drink orders quick. After that we waited for her to come take our food order for 15 minutes. After that it took 20 minutes to actually get our food and appetizer.  I finished my drink quickly, and she walked by our table about 3 times. I finally moved my empty cup to the edge of the table, thinking she would notice right away...but NOPE. Walked by 3-4 more times, when finally my boyfriend waved her down. While we were eating, she came to check on us once, and did not clear any of the empty glasses or dishes. Like c'mon. We asked for some more "bottomless fries" and I think the basket came out with 10 fries. Red Robin is usually one of my favorite places, but this one greatly disappointed. Again the food is 5 star but the service is 1-2 stars here at most. Good Luck!

We took our nephew here to celebrate his 7th birthday, per his request. I was surprised he ordered the kids mac and cheese, given we were in a 'burger joint'. I texted my sister to ask if he always orders that and indeed he does, oh and along with a chocolate shake. Anyway, the service was meh, it was lacking that factor that made you feel like you wanted to be there. Every server in fact that entered the dining room we were seated looked unenthused, making me wonder why we were there... Oh yeah, the birthday boy. The rest of our order was as follows: -Poutine fries: Not the best poutine, but the cheese wasn't bad, if anything would recommend asking for the gravy on the side. Otherwise, you'll have a big puddle of gravy and soggy fries. -Waffle and chicken sandwich: I didn't order this, but the finace said it wasn't great and I could tell because he didn't finish it. He's not one to waste food or not take it go, but he did both. Shocker! -Royal Red Robin burger: Th quality isn't what it used to be. Aside from the service, this was my biggest disappointment. I actually wished I had ate a homecooked meal and was pretty sad we wasted our calories on dining here. Anyway, it wasn't a complete wash. Our nephew had a great time and that was the whole point. If it was just me and my man looking for a place to dine out, I won't be returning here. Also, the whole pay for your check at the table on their iPad machine was a new experience for me and it just added to that impersonal vibe even more. Surprisingly the machine asked if I wanted a receipt, I hit yes, thinking it would print up front and someone would actually have to bring it to me. Um, no. A receipt spit out, but was completely blank. RR was in the regular rotation years back when I worked in Woodland Hills and was great. I was hugely disappointed with the quality of food and the service.
always lagging, even when you order for pick up or ahead...even gave them an extra few min after the time they told me...

Shae the waitress we had was barely helpful and slow in bringing us the food and everything else.  I asked for more fries and broccoli and the look she gave me said it all.  Also,  I never knew they had a zoo in Santa Clarita because it definitely felt like a zoo in here.  From where I was sitting I could see inside the kitchen and it was a mess.  Really poor management at this location.  The place looks nice I give you that but the service was horrible especially my server Shae.  Last thing I wanted to say was that I gave her cash to pay my bill and she didn't bring me the right change so I just took it out of her tip.  The end!
As always! Had a great time and enjoyed good food. Want to acknowledge our waitress "Aubrey" for just being awesome.

Dirty, dirty, dirty. On the way in a cockroach.ran  by the front door, big basterd. We walked in to no hostess or servers. When finally greeted the server was plesant. Every table we could see was dirty including the floor. The table we were sat at had crap all over it and the seats. When I commented about it to the server he got pissy and pushed on for a drink order. It took about 2 minutes for us to walk out. If it's that dirty across the restaurant you can bet the kitchen is the same and i am not paying good money to get sick

Haven't been here in a while. Same excellent service - from beginning to end.  Today we sat in the bar area. The bartender, Mallory, rocked. It was Sunday - Mother's Day and she did an excellent job taking care of her tables, as well as kept up with drink orders coming in - she was the only bartender working at the time.  All staff was attentive and courteous! The awesome thing was, we saw the server we used to always get, Taaron - he brought us our food. Again, so pleasant and funny. Food was good and came out within 14 minutes. The bartender even did her two minute check back after the food was delivered to us. Great service, every time.  Thanks for the great experience again!
Food is good but the service was long!!!! They need to hire more help. The waiter was so busy with other tables. Hubby's choice

Nice place very clean , food was good service was HORRIBLE !!!!!!! Took them 20min to bring our drinks out then we asked for ranch we called for a server & nothing we pretty much finished our food and still no ranch !

The service here is un-matched. The atmosphere is pleasant. The selection in the menu, is very diverse.  The food is extraordinary.  The bottomless fries and drinks are perfectly portioned.  I deffanetly recommend this place

Mediocre food. Came here after work because it was close. Ordered the:  Salmon burger: literally a filet placed in a bun with tomato, cheese, lettuce, fried lemon. It wasn't bad but probably wouldn't order it again.  South western burger: was good better than the salmon burger. Juicy and tasty.  French fries were the best part tbh.  Service here was excellent. That was main part that made this a good di

So last night I went with my boyfriend to Red Robin. The food was okay but once we got home our stomachs were hurting. The whole night I was in the bathroom stuff coming out of both ends. Today our stomachs still hurt. I use to go to red Robbin all the time but now I will probably will never go back.

Came here on a Sunday night, craving a burger. The food was up to par, but the service could've been a lot better. It took about 10-15 mins for our server to come to our table to get our drink order and another 10-15 mins to get her attention to order more fries. I'm a big fan of Red Robin but this totally just ruined my experience. This Red Robin had those machines at the table where you can call your server and it'll display a call light. We attempted that a few times but that did not get our server's attention, nor any other employee's.  Decided to add another star towards the end because the server apologized for the long wait.

This place needs to work on their customer service! Came into eat with my family I wait at hostess stand this guy comes over and ask how many. I told him 3 so he said ok it shouldn't be long. We are waiting and waiting finally another girl walks over to us and asks if we are waiting cause two groups are there but she only has one name on list. We told her exactly what the guy told us so she took our name down. People that came in after us already were seated and we are still waiting ! I'm sorry but my 2 yr old is hungry and doesn't want to wait anymore. I don't think I will return after this. That was ridiculous
Food was pretty good, kind of know what to expect when ordering at RR. Fries always good. Kept my water full, which I like. Not a bad visit.

Big reason we go to Red Robin is the fries. Today they were terrible,  over cooked and dry.  We sent back 3 times and each new order came out just as bad if not worse.  When I asked what was going on,  the response was maybe they just got busy and left them in the fryer.  Being busy is not an excuse to deliver bad food.
The service has really become terrible.  It used to be good when it was at the mall but really went down hill since. The waiter Daniel was so bad we even asked if it was his first day.

This is so disappointing!  This is one of those places that you want to love but I really just cant.  It was dirty, which is really pathetic when it's a brand new remodel.  Sat at the bar - and after eating almost half of an order of boneless wings realized they weren't fully cooked!  The manager took it off our bill - but really - that's all you are going to do for ruining my meal? I'd rather drive through McDonalds and get a 6 pack of beer on the way home...

I can see how you can get overwhelmed with the food served here. I ate here when it was busy, late at night, and on a rainy day. It could be different some other day, but this is the time of day I went. The atmosphere is ok. The entrance is no where near the parking lot. The service was okay, being that there was 2 servers for so many tables. I think the bottomless fries were awesome because you could get unlimited orders. I think the burgers needs more focused on revamping. The burgers werent that appealing.

Just left on Saturday the day before fathers day and it was pretty busy but we got seated right away. Our waiter JAMES was awesome, we love him, totally interactive and very funny and cheery. The food was delicious and very filling, the restrooms were clean and smelled good. The floor was a little dirty but as we were eating someone was cleaning up. We will definitely come back !!

Probably will not be returning the serve microwaved bacon and their pictures don't match the amount of food you really get. I mean if it were close then I wouldn't complain.  And the service was very poor she walked by us many times and didn't stop to see if we wanted refills. And their people just seem plan lazy. Very disappointed

Wow! I ordered take out for the first time at Red Robin today and I got excellent service when I went in to pick up my food! The girl Aria who helped me was super sweet and offered me a drink once I sat down to wait. She came back with my water and a complimentary cup of fries! She then gave me my very delicious food and walked me out to open the door for me. I have never had this great of service here, so I was very happy!

Avoid this Red Robin store if you'd like to avoid food poisoning. I've eaten here twice and both times I've gotten sick right after. Today was the worst. I barely had finished my meal (California chicken with garlic fries) and my stomach started doing loops. Not sure if it's a bad food product that this one AND the Northridge store uses, or just my (not very) sensitive stomach. Our server was super nice; this made my experience a little better. If only both this location and Northridge did not make my stomach literally rebel against me. Honestly haven't had anything close to this happen to me at the one in Redondo beach. Maybe it's a regional issue. I'm not even sure anymore. Again, avoid if you don't want to get sick.
Delicious burgers, courteous waiters, fast service, great atmosphere, bottomless fries, need I say more? Highly recommend this place, a little pricey but great food.

Tried it again after 2 months and still the poor waitresses are understaffed and busy. Seen two tables including us go to front check in looking for waiters for refills on drinks. Food is good, service is bad. Don't expect any comps, just deal with it lol
Terrible service, not at all accommodating. Luckily I don't live in the area so there's no chance of returning. Big mistake.

The service here is un-matched. The atmosphere is pleasant. The selection in the menu, is very diverse.  The food is extraordinary.  The bottomless fries and drinks are perfectly portioned.  I deffanetly recommend this place

That was the worst food I have ever eaten. Every bun was soggy and the staff was rude when we asked for a soggy burger to be replaced. The reason the food was soggy is our food was late and sat in foil wrappers under a heat lamp. I will never go to Red Robin again.

They moved from the mall to the old Elephant Bar restaurant building.   All by itself in the old Pavillions shopping center, parking can be a little difficult sometimes, even on a Monday for lunch. They have quite a large menu for burgers.  They had a special going on for one particular style burger with fries.  I believe it was $6.99 or so.   It was basically a Big Mac, two patties, with a real piece of lettuce, tomato, etc.  it was just a little better than the Golden Arches, unfortunately.  Oh, and when you pay to upgrade your endless fries to onion rings, they give you only four onion rings!  No mention of seconds. My wife fared better on her hamburger choice... it looked like a real burger with sauce, etc.  the French fries were just so so. Good thing she joined the Red Robin club on her app, otherwise we would've paid full price for her free birthday burger.

Decided to go for an early dinner after a long day.  Arrived at 4:00 on a Monday, parking lot virtually empty so we figured this is a good sign being in between the lunch and dinner rush.  There were plenty of booths and tables available however we were seated at the tiny table.  There were 3 tables that hadn't been cleared in spite of a full crew in a virtually empty restaurant.  Took awhile for our waitress to come to the table to take our drink orders.  Asked her if we could be moved to a bigger table, no re-appearance of our waitress however another employee said he would clean one and we would be re-seated.  Moved over, waitress took awhile to re-appear to take our orders.  Received our "Gourmet Burgers" at 5:00 which consisted of mediocre frozen beef patties and frozen steak fries.  Iced tea was so watered down it didn't taste like tea.  At no point did our waitress visit the table to see if we need anything.  Tables that needed to be bussed were still clustered, floor very dirty, visit to the restroom unveiled 3 discarded cardboard toilet rolls on the floor, waste bin overflowing with towels on the floor.   We will not be visiting this restaurant again.

I was looking through the reviews and at first didn't want to come here. My friend insisted, and I'm glad he did. The place was very clean, there were plenty of staff to assist, the food selection was really good. I didn't try one of their burgers but I will be back for one. I ordered the prime rib sandwich, French dip, loaded with meat and steak fries, all you can eat. I was impressed and the sandwich was delish.

I had such a great experience here last night! And it's all thanks to Aria. I decided to place a pick up order and it was fast and easy. I arrived to pick up my order right on the dot and it was actually ready! I was greeted by Aria and she has so happy and friendly, she knew exactly what I ordered without looking at the receipt and before handing me my order she gave me a complementary cup with french fries for the drive home "YAY!" she had no idea what a horrible day I had that day and her friendliness and commitment to deliver was impeccable! Thank you Aria for giving me your 100%! Oh almost forgot! The food was great! five stars!

I've never had a bad experience at this Red Robin. The food is excellent the staff is very polite at my last visit my waiter Tanner was the best waiter I've had yet. I recommend this Red Robin over all others.
I had signed up for there reward program and came in for my free birthday lunch they told me it takes 24 hours to go through the manager was kind enough to honor my b-day lunch great service

Amazing. Me & my family went down to Six Flags this weekend & on our way home we stopped here for some dinner. Our waiter was James & he was absolutely amazing. He took our orders in a timely matter, always checked up on us. Thank you to the chefs as well because our food was great. Would definitely go back.
Haley was hilarious!!! She was quick, witty, and made the end of a very hard day fun and enjoyable. I recommend the fried zucchini and chicken sandwhich (lettuce wrapped).

I've been to Red Robin so many times in my life, I've never thought to review it on Yelp.  Today for lunch our service was so good, Yelp was the first way I thought of to compliment our server.  Jolene was so attentive from the moment we walked in.  I haven't had that good of service even from a five star restaurant.  We will definitely ask for her next time we come in.

They need to change the slogan to, "Red Robin...SLOWWWWW!" The place was empty and we were seated for several minutes before the server made his presence. I ordered a side salad and the kids ordered kids meals. The drinks (water) had a slow delivery too. I got my salad and was curious how fresh the fries were because of the wait. Sure enough, powder texture under the heat lamp too long consistency. The table next to us was complaining about the slow service as well. Did I mention the restaurant was more than half empty? I thought moving from the mall would up the quality of customer service but unfortunately I was wrong...

I loved going here. I love their food so much! Unfortunately after yesterday I will not be going back. Our server never checked on us, but would look at our table. We all needed refills, and never got one. I asked for ranch, and it came out 15 MINUTES after I asked. I looked at the time purposely. I asked to speak to a manager, and his response was "I'll get you the check if you're ready?" Really?? We have been sitting here for over 20 minutes now waiting to pay with cash. I didn't expect anything from the manager but an apology, and a response that they would work on their service but didn't even get that. Love the food but rather drive to Northridge than be at this location.

Went to Red Robin for a birthday lunch and the waitress disappeared for a long time. We saw her leave with her purse but she didn't say she was leaving on her break or anything. The first time to place our order we waited 20 minutes then we waited and waited for our drinks to be refilled and that took half hour (not exaggerating) the manager came out refilled our drinks but didn't apologize or sent the waitress to help. The customer service was awful! Would not recommend.
Not crowded. Super slow service. It took a long time for the dude to take our order, and an even longer time to get it. In and Out is faster than this!

Service in the bar is a joke at lunch time.  I sat patiently whilst I watched one server run around serving way to many tables, oh and that was also the bartender.  When I can hear other customers complaining about service, that's my cue to leave. What a waste of my lunch time.  No drink, no lunch, just a menu. DISMAL CUSTOMER SERVICE

Was here the other night and had Emma as our server. She was amazing! So sweet and always checking up on us to make sure we had everything we needed. Great service, and you can't beat bottomless fries.

I walked into the restaurant with great expectations remembering the last one I went to in Topanga Mall.  My family was seated as I was taking pictures of the pictures they had up in the front of the restaurant. The waitress never said come on .. nothing. I turned around and they were gone and seated.  The floors and tables looked clean and free of debris. We were waited on quickly and did not have to wait longer then 10 minutes for our food. It was very appealing to the eye, however did not taste very good. I ordered the veggie burger and I'll never order it again. The waitress took our left over food away when we weren't done and then never asked us if we wanted to take it home. Then later on our waitress, Jolene had the nerve to come over and ask us before our desert whether or not we could move to another table because she was getting off work and wanted to get the tip rather then her replacement getting it. Oh and when our food came it came without napkins. Dressing and juice was coming from my burger down my hands and I had nothing to dry them with. I had to get up and go ask another waitress for napkins. Jolene never asked us if we were satisfied with our meal or checked on us.  The other waitress whose name was Stephanie was super. She would go from customer to customer making sure they were happy. She also gave me my napkins. I wish we would have had her.  We went into the bathroom and there were no sanitary napkins for the toilet seat and there was paper all over the floor. It was pretty dirty. After leaving the bathroom, I went over to the manager to tell him of our concerns. I told him our waitress was friendly but very unprofessional. I also praised the waitress that was not ours. Honestly, I don't think he cared at all. I won't be back at that location.

Ok we usually love Red Robin and we eat at Red Robin all the time. But this branch is pretty awful. The service is just ok. Also, if you order to go, be prepared to wait about 20 minutes extra once you walk in to pick it up before you get your order. It really seems like they wait to make it until you get there. Lastly, the picture below is why we won't be coming back. The left is what the picture on their menu shows. The right is what I got. And it was as disgusting as it looks. Is this a joke? Pub Mac and Cheese... more like Puke Mac and Cheese.

I really, really tried to like this place and it is my second time at this location. Location is just absolutely horrible starting with dirty bathrooms lack of management and staff. Every time I visit this location there are many dirty tables around a huge line of people waiting and the food Is absolutely horrible. Never coming back here.

Food is okay, all meals were brought out separately...we had 6 in our group and they couldn't manage to get our food brought out to us at the same time.  Everything we asked for that didn't come with dinner ie; bbq sauce, mustard, etc had been brought out late. The manager came to tell us they were working on the rest of our meals and didn't really seem too concerned. This is annoying especially since we have a toddler and have to time everything around her and when meals are staggered it creates frustration for everyone more so than normal. Our waitress was nice enough but it still doesn't make up for the horrible service.

Since this location had moved grim the mall, it is HORRIBLE. The service is slow and when we ask the manager to turn the air conditioner on as it was very warm inside, he apprised us that corporate controls the temperature. It seems that corporate has made many changes that have impacted my family and I from returning. E.g. smaller portions yet higher prices, lack of service, removal of menu items, self ordering machines that don't work most of the time, etc etc.

I'm not giving one star just because I don't want to be cruel.  This was my very first time going to any Red Robin.  When we got there we were seated very fast.  However, it took about 15 minutes for the waitress to actually come greet us and ask us for our drinks.  The waitress was polite but never smiled.  Maybe this is not the type of food for me but the burger I order was beyond greasy and cold when it arrived.  My husband ordered what is supposed to be bottomless fries, and to be honest I have never seen a plate with so few fries to start with.  When he asked for more they brought literally like 6 fries in one plate.  I almost left everything in my plate.  I really don't think I will try another Red Robin again.
Went for lunch today and had a nice time, Ryan was a very nice waiter and did his best to accommodate our party of 7.  The food was good and the service was great.
This place is so good I love the burgers and unlimited fries! I will be back very soon and enjoy my unlimited fires and food!

Wow. Just wow. I met a friend for dinner and we both ordered drinks, an appetizer and burgers. About half way through eating my friend notices a large clump in his Mushroom Swiss Burger. The thing looked like a hair ball pulled from a drain. Needless to say we stopped eating. Our waitress came back to the table and we pointed it out. Her response was they are using new mushrooms in the kitchen. Really?!?! We ask to speak to the manager and she takes this "thing" with her. We should have taken a photo first. The manager, Sam, comes back and tells us the same "new mushroom vendor" story and they had seen this before and offers to clear our remaining plates and then disappears. Then nothing! 10 minutes later our waitress comes back apologetic and letting us know the manager is taking off my friends burger off the bill. That's it? At this point we are pissed and ask to see the manager again. He comes back and asks us what we want to do. Maybe do the right thing and apologize and comp the meal? We tell him we want the GM's name and that we are paying the whole bill and flaming them for the poor handling of this. He disappears and we try and pay on the Ziosk on the table and they had locked it. A guy named Cliff comes over and introduces himself as the GM and tells us that the manger should have told us the meal was comped and told us that he had never heard of any other complaints about the mushrooms. After a heated exchange we left. Needless to say I won't be visiting this location anytime soon.
